title: MY OPINION ON TT>SR
body:
The reason I enjoy TT more is due to the fact that there is no accepted "meta". Now don't get me wrong lane/jungle distribution is perfect... but I enjoy the fact that TT does not force you to play in such a way that is deemed acceptable. It's you, your team and skill/knowledge. I've won without tanks, without AD(with a mundo on the other team was not very good but still). Now i'm not saying i dislike SR just they way it is played now... Or  perhaps always has? It's just my two cents and preference.

I may even start ranked(which i don't do in any game) (even if it is just to get away from the bots)
If you would like to add me, do so always looking for relaxed players looking for a fun time! (i'm not TT exclusive)
